products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Roller Blind
products.description: This beautiful and elegant range comes in a variety of colours to choose from that will look good in any room. Their splash sloe roller blind in an attractive purple colour is a perfect choice to help you transform your space. products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash sloe purple is a soft chic purple perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this on-trend purple blind is especially great for adding a soft splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash sloe is an extremely attractive dusty purple colour, stylish and timeless. Perfect for injecting colour into any room. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). Splash sloe fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Splash Orchid Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash orchid purple electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The pink/purple hue is a beautiful, bold shade which draws the eye and livens up the decor. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space. At swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
